it.polimi.ingsw.bogliobresich.model.deck

Class Deck

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.bogliobresich.model.deck.Deck
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CharacterDeck, ItemDeck, PortholeDeck, SectorDeck

    public abstract class Deck
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides a skeletal implementation of a deck of cards. The Deck class implements a growable array of cards.
    The size of a Deck can grow or shrink as needed to accommodate adding and removing items after the Deck has been created.
    Version:
    1.1
    Author:
    matteo bresich, simone boglio
    See Also:
    CardFinishedException, NoReShuffleableException

        public void reShuffle()
               throws CardFinishedException
